data.meta_description: The Oneida Chamber of Commerce Blog-keep up to date on what's happening in the Oneida business community
data.text:
Please consider introducing a new friend to the Oneida Performing Arts series!

Please consider introducing a new friend to the Oneida Performing Arts series!

Tickets at the door at $25 for a single performance

Tickets for the season (5 shows !) are $50-$60 per person

Five varied productions sponsored by the Oneida Performing Arts during the 2014-15 winter series.

Held in the Oneida HS auditorium

For more information 363-7064, or pleasevisit us at www.OneidaPerformingArts.com

or PO Box 51, Oneida 13421

Come celebrate our 51st Season with us and help us keep

professional performing arts alive in the greater Oneida area!

10/18/14 BONERAMA

7:30@Oneida High School

This New Orleans-based brass funk rock band brings their high energy, New Orleans style music show to Oneida as we kick off our 51st season. Bonerama carries the brass-band concept to places unknown! Make sure to bring your favorite music students to the show with you.

11/1/14 Vanaver Caravan Dance Company

7:30@Oneida High School

Performing an All-American dance show featuring the music of Pete Seegar, the Vanaver Caravan has captivated audiences worldwide with its celebration of American and International dance and music. The day prior to the perfor-mance, they will spend time with local dance studios. Your favorite dance students will want to certainly come along.

12/13/14 Symphor!a

8:00@Oneida High School

Central New York’s professional symphony brings us their gift of inspiring orchestral music. Selections include holiday favorites!

Sponsored by the Chapman Foundation

Saturday, 1/17/15 “Trial and Error”

5:00 Cash Bar / 5:30 dinner and show

Rusty Rail restaurant on Route 5 in Canastota

The fun starts at 5pm with a cash bar followed by dinner/ show at 5:30pm. Join us for an interactive mystery where due to unusual a circumstance, the court is being held at The Rusty Rail! It’s the most ridiculous, hilarious miscar¬riage of the justice system ever. You may be a witness or even the villain!

Please note: This special “add-in” performance is not included in the cost of season tickets. Please order separately. $30 each, $55 per couple, or $200 for a table of 8.

4/25/15 Central Winds

7:30@Oneida High School

The ever-popular Central Winds, the Music Educators’ Wind Ensemble of Central New York, is back to perform

a variety of music sure to make you smile and hum along.

5/2/15 Angel of Music:

A Salute to Andrew Lloyd Webber

7:30@Oneida High School

This salute to Andrew Lloyd Webber stars acclaimed Broad¬way veterans Glory Crampton and Franc D’Ambrosio. Enjoy their renditions of your favorite selections from Phantom of the Opera, Jesus Christ Superstar, Evita and more!
